message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the opportunity, I'm looking to pay closer to $950,000. This would allow us both to make a good deal. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1,025,000.
